channel.title: AI on Cho-Nan Tsai CTO media interviews, essays and talks
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Cho-Nan Tsai CTO media interviews, essays and talks

item.title: AI drew Steve Jobs eating sushi
item.description: Today I use an AI tool to draw a picture of Steve Jobs eating sushi. This is what I got: Remembering what I read in Steve Jobs by Walter Isaacson, Jobs’ favorite food was sushi. Although Jobs had a turbulent relationship with Lisa, he often recounted the good times while eating sushi in Tokyo with his daughter. Trust me, I have tried on a number of different AI image generator sites, including DALL.
